title: Patch 6.7, game won't open
body: every time i open league, the logo appears for a while then dissapears and league never opens, i tried the RADS thing but that won't work, i re-installed it and it still won't work, i'm on oce and have avast internet security.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try temporarily disabling Avast for me, let me know if you're able to launch the game with Avast disabled.
